sentences.en: A coefficient of one means the markets move perfectly in step.
sentences.cn: 系数为1表示各个市场的步调完全一致。

sentences.en: A compliance coefficient is a particular kind of flexibility - influence coefficient.
sentences.cn: 柔度系数是挠曲影响系数的一种特殊类型.

sentences.en: A soil having a uniformity coefficient smaller than 2 is considered uniform.
sentences.cn: 均匀系数小于2的土壤可视为均质土.

sentences.en: Food expenses dropped to 58.8 percent of the consumption expenditure ( the Engel coefficient ) in 1994.
sentences.cn: 1994年,农村居民的食品支出占消费支出的比重 ( 恩格尔系数 ) 降为58.8%.

sentences.en: In 3 xy, 3 is the coefficient of xy.
In 8pq, the coefficient of pq is 8.
Pascal published a treatus on binomial coefficient.
sentences.cn: 帕斯克发表了关于二项系数的论文.

sentences.en: The absorption coefficient is often strongly wavelength - dependent.
sentences.cn: 吸收系数往往与波长密切相关.

sentences.en: The coefficient of correlation, R, is obtained by taking the square root of R 2.
sentences.cn: 相关系数R是通过把R2开平方根求得的.

sentences.en: The distribution coefficient equation is still valid for any value of n.
sentences.cn: 对任一级n,分配系数关系式仍然是成立的.

sentences.en: The drop of the " Engel's coefficient'signified a new improvement in people's quality of life.
sentences.cn: " 恩格尔 系数 " 的下降,标志着人们的生活质量有了新的提高.

sentences.en: The greater the sum, the greater the cross - correlation coefficient obtained in this way will be.
sentences.cn: 和数越大, 以这种形式得到的相关系数也越大.

sentences.en: The housing has a higher coefficient of expansion than the ring.
sentences.cn: 壳体比圆环具有较高的膨胀系数.

sentences.en: The value of the sticking coefficient may have to be revised.
sentences.cn: 附着系数的值可能应有所修正.

sentences.en: We can manipulate the expression for reflection coefficient.
sentences.cn: 我们可以利用反射系数公式.

phrases.tran_cn: 变异系数；变动系数；变更系数
膨胀系数，膨胀率；展开系数
传质系数；质量传递系数
渗透系数；渗滤系数；透气系数；磁导系数

trans.tran_cn: 系数，（测定某种质量或变化过程的）率，程度，协同因素
trans.tran_en: the number by which an unknown quantity is multiplied
